headline: Does Japan’s Approval of Iodine Hip Implants Alter the Bull Case for Zimmer Biomet (ZBH)?
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings recently announced that Japan’s Pharmaceutical and Medical Devices Agency approved the iTaperloc Complete and iG7 Hip System, featuring Iodine Technology to inhibit bacterial adhesion on implant surfaces. This milestone marks the world’s first approval of orthopedic implants utilizing Iodine Technology, offering an innovative solution for infection prevention in joint replacement surgeries. We'll explore how the introduction of Iodine Technology in hip implants could...

headline: Zimmer Biomet Completes Acquisition of Monogram Technologies
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings, Inc. (NYSE and SIX: ZBH) ("Zimmer Biomet"), a global medical technology leader, today announced it has completed the acquisition of Monogram Technologies Inc. ("Monogram"), an AI-driven, next-generation orthopedic robotics company.
